attributes.action: Adopt the 'Australian Points Test Mechanism'. Reform our Immigration policy.
attributes.additional_details:
Its time for Britain to re-think its Immigration Policy. Too long have we seen and endless flow of foreign nationals settle in Britain and milking us dry. Schools are bursting, jobs are scarce, NHS waiting list growing by the day and local governments unable to keep up with housing demands.
The 'Australian points test mechanism' assesses each applicant on a number of different skills to provide a positive contribution to the country's  economy.
We want the UK government to adopts this system as we believe we will see a fall in immigrants claiming state benefit, better integration, lowered crime rates and reduced annual net immigration resulting in less strain on public services.
